@graph.name: Vegan Chocolate Zoats - Vegan Heaven

@graph.name: Vegan Chocolate Zoats
@graph.description: Are you looking for an easy, delicious, and healthy breakfast? Then these vegan chocolate zoats with berries and almond butter might be perfect for you!
recipeIngredient: 1 cup shredded zucchini (I used one medium zucchini)

recipeInstructions.text: Put the chia seeds in a small bowl and stir in 6 tablespoons of plant-based milk. Allow to thicken while you make the rest of the zoats.
recipeInstructions.name: Put the chia seeds in a small bowl and stir in 6 tablespoons of plant-based milk. Allow to thicken while you make the rest of the zoats.

recipeInstructions.text: Place the oats, the shredded zucchini, and the almond or oat milk in a small pot and cook for about 5 minutes on medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Place the oats, the shredded zucchini, and the almond or oat milk in a small pot and cook for about 5 minutes on medium heat.

recipeInstructions.text: Then stir in the mashed banana, the cacao, the soaked chia seeds, and if using the agave.
recipeInstructions.name: Then stir in the mashed banana, the cacao, the soaked chia seeds, and if using the agave.

recipeInstructions.text: Put in two bowls and top it off with fresh berries (I used blueberries and raspberries), bananas, kiwi, almond butter, coconut flakes, and chopped dark chocolate.
recipeInstructions.name: Put in two bowls and top it off with fresh berries (I used blueberries and raspberries), bananas, kiwi, almond butter, coconut flakes, and chopped dark chocolate.
